item.title: ajaxed up on ruby on rails. seriously this time.
item.description: So i haven’t really been posting to my blog as i would like. I have instead been coding ruby on rails applications. it is fun. i am kinda bored. sorta. not really. i was bored. then i discovered the ajax helpers. haha. so much fun. unfortunately a site such as harperreed.org doesn’t lend itself to being ajax’d. I was able to do some fanciness with the quotation on the front and the contact form.
